description: We've got a delicious country boy for you named Wade coming from the middle of nowhere Texas and he's got the accent to prove it. You can tell right away that this one is a smart one. He might sound like he's dumb as a box of rocks and you can tell he plays it up but Wade's a pretty smart cookie.Mike drills him hard but he keeps right up and dodges the questions he doesn't want to answer by saying things like: 'When they ain't no grass on the field you go play in the mud' LOL. Wade is all about trying some new things but he just don't want this shit to get out and Mike assures him that his secrets are safe with him. This baby-faced country boy is a real charmer and when he comes out of his underwear he's sporting a damn fine dick that's already hard as nails. He's got a nice hairy chest and fury legs and low hangers that'll make you drool. Once he gets that cock good and angry we see what a nice piece of meat he's packing. It's got a nice curve in it, too. When he finally shoots his load it just gushes out in spurts and his moaning will drive you up the wall.
title: Wade, Scene #01
